QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ENROLID, SEX, DOBYR, DTSTART, DTEND, null PLANKEY, SUBSTRING(RIGHT('00000000000' + cast(ENROLID as VARCHAR), 11), 1,9) Family, null RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, null RACE_CONCEPT_ID, null ETHNICITY_SOURCE_VALUE, null ETHNICITY_CONCEPT_ID, CASE PLANTYP WHEN 1 THEN '{prefix} Basic/Major Medical' WHEN 2 THEN '{prefix} Comprehensive' WHEN 3 THEN '{prefix} EPO' WHEN 4 THEN '{prefix} HMO' WHEN 5 THEN '{prefix} POS' WHEN 6 THEN '{prefix} PPO' WHEN 7 THEN '{prefix} POS with Capitation' WHEN 8 THEN '{prefix} CDHP' WHEN 9 THEN '{prefix} HDHP' ELSE '{prefix} Other' END as ps, DATATYP, EGEOLOC, 44814722 PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE WHEN MHSACOVG IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE MHSACOVG END AS VALUE_AS_NUMBER FROM {sc}.ENROLLMENT_DETAIL JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID WHERE RX = '1')
select *, CASE WHEN DATATYP IN (2,4) THEN 'C ' ELSE 'N ' END + ps PayerSource, 900000010 AS OBSERVATION_CONCEPT_ID, 'MHSACOVG' AS OBSERVATION_SOURCE_VALUE from a ORDER BY ENROLID
